Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.elements.exceptions

Exception Summary
ChangeMemberGroupException Base class representing an exception when remove a member or move to other group
CircularBrokeringException Exception thrown when the brokering relation would be circular, or when trying make a member his own broker
ContactAlreadyExistException  
InvalidGroupTypeException  
MemberAlreadyInBrokeringsException Exception thrown when trying to add a member to a brokering list and he is already on it
MemberHasBalanceException Exception thrown when trying to remove a member that has balance in one of his accounts
MemberHasOpenInvoicesException Exception thrown when trying to remove a member that has open invoices
MemberHasPendingLoansException Exception thrown when trying to remove a member that has open loans
MemberHasPendingScheduledPaymentsException Exception thrown when trying to remove a member that has pending scheduled payments
MemberWontReceiveNotificationException Exception thrown when a notification would be sent to a member, but he decided not to receive that type of notification
NoInitialGroupException Exception thrown when there is no initial group for a member registration
PendingMessagesException Exception thrown when a message is attempted to be deleted but there are pending messages to be sent that require its information.
RegistrationAgreementNotAcceptedException Exception thrown when registering a member and the registration agreement was not agreed
UsernameAlreadyInUseException Exception thrown when trying to register a member with an username that is already in use
